text: Bogthorn is a hamlet which forms part of KeighleyJohn Marius Wilson, Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales (1870-72) in the City of Bradford, West Yorkshire, England. It lies between Exley Head and Oakworth on Keighley Road which is part of the B6143 road. A Wesleyan chapel was built at the corner of Goose Cote Lane in 1882. ==References== Category:Villages in West Yorkshire
title: Bogthorn
